text: @senatemajldr @JudyWoodruff @NewsHour Schools are asked to reopen and economy is reopening in stages. #S3599 can improve healthcare in hospitals and provide support if #COVID19 cases increase. Please add it to #HEALSact. It'll be incomplete without "Healers"
